welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kivisto, Finland! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of our city, known for its stunning natural landscape and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and explore all that Kivisto has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Helsinki-vantaa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Helsinki-malmi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hyvinkaa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Hyvinkaa Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
